>>1)photos should be ONLY screen shots.  certain inappropriate photos
>>will result in . . I'd rather not cross that bridge until I have to.

Does it have to be screenshots only? what if i edited a screenshot so it was 
funny, like two wizards dueling, but a faerie gets cought in the middle, 
with text balloons and stuff. like a Glad comic.

>>2)no posting screen shots of a scenario WITHOUT the permission of the
>>creator of the scenario.  Screen shots from built-in scenarios are
>>automatically ok, right Tom Ricket?

>>3)if I start to have problems with people (emphasis: more than 3)
>>breaking the 1st two rules, I will shut down access to moderators only
>>can upload photos.  Unfortunately, this will also effect the files
>>area.
